QuestData.Title: The Shell of Shadra
QuestData.Description: The final piece is all we need to burn Shadra out for good.$B$BThe Shell of Shadra is held by the spider god's last living high priestess, Qiaga the Keeper. She stands atop the Altar of Zul, guarded by other fanatical zealots.$B$BYou've got to climb that altar to the top and take her out! She'll have the Shell in her possession. Bring it back here.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Qiaga is a devoted disciple of Shadra. She will not part with the shell easily.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Qiaga the Keeper and collect the Shell of Shadra.
